Package stars

Class CourseManager

java.lang.Object
stars.CourseManager
public class CourseManager
extends java.lang.Object
A class that manages the data of of courses and indexes within the STARS system. Provides way to read course and index information from files and writing new data back to those files, as well as accessing their information.
Since:
23/11/2020
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Lai Ming Hui, Ding Cong Cong

  • Constructor Details

    • CourseManager

      public CourseManager​(java.lang.String courseFile, java.lang.String indexFile)
      Initializes this manager from data using files that contain course information and index information.
      Parameters:
      courseFile - The name of the file that contain course information in flat file format.
      indexFile - The name of the file that contains indexes in flat file format.

  • Method Details

    • save

      public void save()
      Writes the contents of this database back to the files information was read from..

    • addIndex

      public void addIndex​(Index_details index, java.lang.String courseCode)
      Add the specified index to the course with the specified course code.
      Parameters:
      index - IndexCode of the specified index.
      courseCode - CourseCode of the specified index.

    • removeIndex

      public void removeIndex​(java.lang.String indexCode)
      Removes the specified index code from this manager.
      Parameters:
      indexCode - The index code to remove.

    • getIndex

      public Index_details getIndex​(java.lang.String indexCode)
      Gets the Index_Details object associated with the index code, it exist within this manager.
      Parameters:
      indexCode - The specified index code to check.
      Returns:
      The Index_detail object associated with the specified code, or null if no such object can be found.

    • getAllIndexes

      public java.util.Collection<Index_details> getAllIndexes()
      Retrieves a collection view of all the indexes managed by this manager. The collection view is backed by the manager; modifications to the objects in the view will be reflected in the manager.
      Returns:
      A collection view of all the indexes managed by this manager.

    • checkIndexExists

      public boolean checkIndexExists​(java.lang.String indexCode)
      Checks if an index with the index code exists within the manager.
      Parameters:
      indexCode - The index code to check
      Returns:
      True if it exists, false otherwise.

    • addCourse

      public void addCourse​(Course course)
      Adds a course to the manager.
      Parameters:
      course - The specified course object.

    • removeCourse

      public void removeCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode)
      Removes a course from the manager.
      Parameters:
      courseCode - The course code of the course to be removed.

    • getAllCourses

      public java.util.Collection<Course> getAllCourses()
      Retrieves a collection view of all courses in the manager. Changes to objects in this view will be reflected back in the manager.
      Returns:
      A collection view of courses in the manager.

    • getCourse

      public Course getCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode)
      Gets the course with the specified course code from the manager
      Parameters:
      courseCode - The code of the specified course
      Returns:
      The course object stored in the manager corresponding to the course code, null otherwise.

    • checkCourseExists

      public boolean checkCourseExists​(java.lang.String courseCode)
      Checks if a course with the specified course code exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      courseCode - The specified course code.
      Returns:
      True if such a course exists, false otherwise.

    • getIndexClasses

      public java.util.List<IndexClass> getIndexClasses​(Index_details index, IndexClassType type)
      Gets the classes under the index with the specified index code with the specified Index Class type.
      Parameters:
      index - The specified Index_details object to retrieve from
      type - A IndexClassType enum member
      Returns:
      A list of Index Class objects with the specified index class type.

    • getLectures

      public java.util.List<IndexClass> getLectures​(Index_details index)
      Gets the lectures classes under the index with the specified index code
      Parameters:
      index - Code of the target index
      Returns:
      A list of Index Class objects which are the lectures classes of the index.

      Returns:

      Returns:

    • getVacancy

      public int getVacancy​(java.lang.String indexCode)
      Gets the vacancy of the index with the course code.
      Parameters:
      indexCode - Code of the target index.
      Returns:

    • isIndexUnderCourse

      public boolean isIndexUnderCourse​(Index_details index, Course course)
      Checks if the specified index is under the specified course.
      Parameters:
      index - The specified index.
      course - The specified course
      Returns:
      True if the index is under the course, false otherwise.

    • getIndexUnderCourse

      public java.util.Set<Index_details> getIndexUnderCourse​(Course course)
      Retrieves all indexes under a course in an unmodifiable set. Changes to this set is not allowed.
      Parameters:
      course - The course to retrieve the indexes from.
      Returns:
      An unmodifiable set containing all indexes within this course. The set can have zero items if no indexes are available.

    • getStudentsInCourse

      public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getStudentsInCourse​(Course course)
      Retrieves a set of matriculation number of students registered under the specified course
      Parameters:
      course - Course code of the target course.
      Returns:
      A set of matriculation number of students registered under the specified course.

    • isStudentInCourse

      public boolean isStudentInCourse​(java.lang.String matricNum, Course course)
      Checks if the specified student matric number is registered under a course.
      Parameters:
      matricNum - The matriculation number of the student
      course - The course code tof the course to be checked
      Returns:
      True if the student is listed under the course, false otherwise.

    • getCourseAU

      public int getCourseAU​(Course course)
      Gets the AU of the course with the specified course code.
      Parameters:
      course - Specified course object
      Returns:
      The AU of the course if the course exists, otherwise -1.
